title: English letter cutter hand typeface
content:
Can anyone suggest a nice simple English letter cutter hand typeface

 [‹ Type on TV](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163537/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32500 "Go to previous forum topic") [Website Design references ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163537/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32470 "Go to next forum topic")
author: display

comments.content:
Not entirely sure what you are searching for, if you are after a typeface that could be cut into stone by hand maybe Rome by Fontsmith

[http://www.fontsmith.com/font\_details.php?page=1&home\_font\_name=rome](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163537/http:/www.fontsmith.com/font_details.php?page=1&home_font_name=rome "http://www.fontsmith.com/font\_details.php?page=1&home\_font\_name=rome")

Tim

[Michael Harvey](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163537/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Michael%252BHarvey) is a stone cutter who happens to design typefaces. You can find some of his fonts on his website, [Fine Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163537/http:/www.finefonts.com/) and/or [follow this link](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163537/http:/www.myfonts.com/person/harvey/michael/) for a more complete list.
